meanings.definition: A gorefest is a film or other work of fiction characterized by an abundance of graphic violence and gore.
meanings.sent1: The gorefests on TV made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The gorefests at the cinema are not for the faint-hearted.
meanings.sent3: The gorefests in that movie were so intense, I almost spilled my popcorn.
meanings.sent4: The gorefests in the film painted a vivid picture of horror.
meanings.sent5: The gorefests in the story were so vivid, they haunted my dreams.

meanings.definition: The party turned into a gorefest after the horror movie marathon began.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected gorefests at the party shocked everyone.
meanings.sent2: The gorefests during the movie night were truly terrifying.
meanings.sent3: The gorefests at the party made us jump out of our seats.
meanings.sent4: The party turned into a gorefest, with screams echoing in the house.
meanings.sent5: The gorefest at the party was so realistic, it felt like we were in a movie.

meanings.definition: The gorefest left the audience shocked and disturbed.

meanings.sent3: The gorefest in the show had everyone talking for days.
